verses.text_plain: The words of Amos, who was among the herdmen of Tekoa, which he saw concerning Israel in the days of Uzziah king of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam the son of Joash king of Israel, two years before the earthquake.
verses.verse_html: 1The words of Amos, who was among the herdmen of Tekoa, which he saw concerning Israel in the days of Uzziah king of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam the son of Joash king of Israel, two years before the earthquake.

verses.text_plain: And he said, The Lord will roar from Zion, and utter his voice from Jerusalem; and the habitations of the shepherds shall mourn, and the top of Carmel shall wither.
verses.verse_html: 2And he said, The Lord will roar from Zion, and utter his voice from Jerusalem; and the habitations of the shepherds shall mourn, and the top of Carmel shall wither.

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of Damascus, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they have threshed Gilead with threshing instruments of iron:
verses.verse_html:
3Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of Damascus, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they have threshed Gilead with threshing instruments of iron: ▼
▼ and…: or, yea, for four
 , ▼
▼ turn…: or, convert it, or, let it be quiet

footnotes.body_html: ▼ and…: or, yea, for four

footnotes.body_text: ▼ turn…: or, convert it, or, let it be quiet
footnotes.body_html: ▼ turn…: or, convert it, or, let it be quiet

verses.text_plain: But I will send a fire into the house of Hazael, which shall devour the palaces of Ben–hadad.
verses.verse_html: 4But I will send a fire into the house of Hazael, which shall devour the palaces of Ben–hadad.

verses.text_plain: I will break also the bar of Damascus, and cut off the inhabitant from the plain of Aven, and him that holdeth the sceptre from the house of Eden: and the people of Syria shall go into captivity unto Kir, saith the Lord.
verses.verse_html:
5I will break also the bar of Damascus, and cut off the inhabitant from the plain of Aven, and him that holdeth the sceptre from the house of Eden: and the people of Syria shall go into captivity unto Kir, saith the Lord. ▼
▼ the plain…: or, Bikathaven
 , ▼
▼ the house…: or, Beth–eden

footnotes.body_html: ▼ the plain…: or, Bikathaven
▼ the house…: or, Beth–eden

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of Gaza, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they carried away captive the whole captivity, to deliver them up to Edom:
verses.verse_html:
6Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of Gaza, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they carried away captive the whole captivity, to deliver them up to Edom: ▼
▼ away captive…: or, them away with an entire

tokens.text: thereof; because they carried away captive

footnotes.body_text: ▼ away captive…: or, them away with an entire
footnotes.body_html: ▼ away captive…: or, them away with an entire

verses.text_plain: But I will send a fire on the wall of Gaza, which shall devour the palaces thereof:
verses.verse_html: 7But I will send a fire on the wall of Gaza, which shall devour the palaces thereof:

verses.text_plain: And I will cut off the inhabitant from Ashdod, and him that holdeth the sceptre from Ashkelon, and I will turn mine hand against Ekron: and the remnant of the Philistines shall perish, saith the Lord God.
verses.verse_html: 8And I will cut off the inhabitant from Ashdod, and him that holdeth the sceptre from Ashkelon, and I will turn mine hand against Ekron: and the remnant of the Philistines shall perish, saith the Lord God.

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of Tyrus, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they delivered up the whole captivity to Edom, and remembered not the brotherly covenant:
verses.verse_html:
9Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of Tyrus, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they delivered up the whole captivity to Edom, and remembered not the brotherly covenant: ▼
▼ the brotherly…: Heb. the covenant of brethren

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the brotherly…: Heb. the covenant of brethren
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the brotherly…: Heb. the covenant of brethren

verses.text_plain: But I will send a fire on the wall of Tyrus, which shall devour the palaces thereof.
verses.verse_html: 10But I will send a fire on the wall of Tyrus, which shall devour the palaces thereof.

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of Edom, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because he did pursue his brother with the sword, and did cast off all pity, and his anger did tear perpetually, and he kept his wrath for ever:
verses.verse_html:
11Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of Edom, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because he did pursue his brother with the sword, and did cast off all pity, and his anger did tear perpetually, and he kept his wrath for ever: ▼
▼ did cast…: Heb. corrupted his compassions

footnotes.body_text: ▼ did cast…: Heb. corrupted his compassions
footnotes.body_html: ▼ did cast…: Heb. corrupted his compassions

verses.text_plain: But I will send a fire upon Teman, which shall devour the palaces of Bozrah.
verses.verse_html: 12But I will send a fire upon Teman, which shall devour the palaces of Bozrah.

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of the children of Ammon, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they have ripped up the women with child of Gilead, that they might enlarge their border:
verses.verse_html:
13Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of the children of Ammon, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they have ripped up the women with child of Gilead, that they might enlarge their border: ▼
▼ ripped…: or, divided the mountains

tokens.text: thereof; because they have ripped up

footnotes.body_html: ▼ ripped…: or, divided the mountains

verses.text_plain: But I will kindle a fire in the wall of Rabbah, and it shall devour the palaces thereof, with shouting in the day of battle, with a tempest in the day of the whirlwind:
verses.verse_html: 14But I will kindle a fire in the wall of Rabbah, and it shall devour the palaces thereof, with shouting in the day of battle, with a tempest in the day of the whirlwind:

verses.text_plain: And their king shall go into captivity, he and his princes together, saith the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 15And their king shall go into captivity, he and his princes together, saith the Lord.
